sentences.sContent: Recognizing that nutrient levels vary in the ocean, they added extra nitrogen and phosphorous to half the tubs in each group.
sentences.sContent_eng: Recognizing that nutrient levels vary in the ocean, they added extra nitrogen and phosphorous to half the tubs in each group.
sentences.sCn: 研究人员认识到海洋中的水含营养成分的水平不同，他们在每一组的半数水缸中额外加入氮和磷。

words.tran: [昆] 发出磷光的；磷光性的

trans.tranOther: of or containing phosphorus in the trivalent state
